dct_title_s: Carte réduite des costes occidentales d'Afrique : premiere feuille contenant les costes de Barbarie depuis le Detroit de Gibraltar jusqu'au Cap Bojador et les Isles Canaries
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. In upper margin: No. 52. Bellin was commissioned by Louis XIV to map all the known coasts of the world, resulting in the publication of the Hydrographie franc̦oise, 1756-1765. cf. Norwich, O.I. Maps of Africa, p. 317, which shows another map in the series.
